company_context: Terraform | HashiCorp Developer HashiConf 2025 Don't miss the live stream of HashiConf Day 2 happening now View live stream Terraform Search âŒ˜/ctrl Command or control key K K key Sign in Sign up Theme Automate Infrastructure on Any Cloud Install Tutorials Documentation What is Terraform? Terraform is an infrastructure as code tool that lets you build, change, and version infrastructure safely and efficiently. This includes low-level components like compute instances, storage, and networking; and high-level components like DNS entries and SaaS features. Learn more Get Started Follow a code-complete, hands-on tutorial to learn the Terraform basics with your favorite infrastructure provider. Amazon Web Services Azure HCP Terraform Google Cloud Platform Oracle Cloud Docker HCP Terraform Automate your infrastructure provisioning at any scale Try HCP Terraform for free Sandbox Terraform sandbox The Terraform sandbox contains preinstalled tools and services for you to experiment with Terraform. Best Practices Terraform style guide Learn recommended style conventions for Terraform configuration and workflows. Phases of Terraform adoption Design your Terraform workflows for scale. Featured Documentation Configuration Language Describe infrastructure in Terraform configuration language. Terraform CLI Learn Terraform's CLI-based workflows. HCP Terraform Collaborate with your team to provision infrastructure. Popular Use Cases 25min Deploy federated multi-cloud Kubernetes clusters Use Terraform to provision Kubernetes clusters in the Azure and AWS clouds, deploy Consul Helm charts enabling Consul federation, and deploy an example application on both clusters. Terraform Consul 25min Create preview environments with Terraform, GitHub Actions, and Vercel Configure HCP Terraform and GitHub Actions to create frontend and backend preview environments for your application. Dynamically create and destroy preview environments by opening, merging and closing pull requests. Terraform 43min Build a golden image pipeline with HCP Packer Create a golden image pipeline with HCP Packer. Build an application image on the base with Packer and provision it on AWS with Terraform. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across your company while researching attendees of HashiConf and noticed you're using Terraform for infrastructure management. Can you tell me a little bit about your current data processing workflow and how you're leveraging Terraform?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (sighs) Yeah, we use Terraform to automate our infrastructure provisioning. But I'm not sure how that's relevant to your call. What is DeepData AI, and how can it help us?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: DeepData AI is a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their data workflows, reducing manual effort and increasing efficiency. I'd love to explore how our solution can complement your existing Terraform setup. For instance, are you currently using any data processing tools to analyze the logs and metrics from your Terraform-managed infrastructure?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (skeptical) Honestly, we're not really looking for another tool to add to our stack. We've got a lot of custom scripts and homegrown solutions that work for us. What makes DeepData AI so special that it's worth considering?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns about adding new tools. However, our solution is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing workflows, including Terraform. We've had success with similar companies in the past, where our AI-powered data processing capabilities helped them uncover hidden insights and optimize their infrastructure usage. I'd be happy to share some case studies or set up a demo to show you how DeepData AI can specifically address your company's needs.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: (still skeptical) Okay, fine. Send me some case studies. But I've got to warn you, we're a very technical team, and we'll be looking for something that can really wow us. What kind of support and integration do you offer for Terraform-specific use cases?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, I'll send over some case studies and technical information on our Terraform integration. We have a dedicated engineering team that works closely with our customers to ensure smooth integration and provide ongoing support. In fact, we've developed a pre-built connector for Terraform that allows our customers to easily integrate their infrastructure data with our platform. Would you be open to a follow-up conversation next week to discuss the case studies and answer any technical questions you may have?
